https://tmrev.io/movie/685495-East Lake Meadows: A Public Housing Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/x9eK4dJN8EOd6ULkqNXrSE78Pko.jpg The history of the East Lake Meadows public housing project in Atlanta and the people who lived there from 1970 to its demolition in 2000, with special emphasis on the activism of Eva Davis asserting the rights of the tenants. East Lake Meadows: A Public Housing Story
